General.Name: Tarku Resources Ltd
General.Description: Tarku Resources Ltd. engages in the exploration of mineral resources in Quebec and Arizona. The company explores for gold, lead, zinc, silver, copper, manganese, nickel, and platinum group element deposits. It holds 100% interests in the Apollo project covering 96 claims with an area of 5,273 hectares; Admiral project comprising 78 claims with an area of 4,334 hectares; and Atlas project consisting of 74 claims with an area of 4,111 hectares located in Quebec. The company also holds 100% interests in the Richardson project covering 42 mining claims covering an area of 2,319 hectares; Bullion project comprising 26 mining claims covering an area of 1,435 hectares situated in Chibougamau; and Silver Strike project covering an area of 1,250 hectares. Tarku Resources Ltd. is headquartered in Montreal, Canada.
General.Address: 224, 4th Avenue S., Saskatoon, SK, Canada, S7K 5M5
